493c7630-367c-41d4-95d2-b7f9a05b4292.description: In communication emphasize on WHAT needs to be done and provide reasoning only when asked / it is not obvious for the audience.
493c7630-367c-41d4-95d2-b7f9a05b4292.name: compaining is easy, working solutions proposals hard

ed348da2-769f-4815-bde9-be1b8f474982.name: zero tolerance for bugs
ed348da2-769f-4815-bde9-be1b8f474982.description:
A good software does not have bugs. It just works - it might be simple or even dummy looking, but it just works without bugs.
Bugs are like broken window, have several of them and the value of your building will go down straight to zero.

3f6e9f11-68fa-4b9f-883b-82976609cdeb.name: invest in planning
3f6e9f11-68fa-4b9f-883b-82976609cdeb.description: Every well invested time in planning results in 2x to 10x improvement in efficiency.

642e1ccb-5223-4787-b46b-f08dc6062dcd.description: The business is a matter of life and death, thus it should be conducted according to its seriousness

5d34afe5-9602-45bb-acd5-17ccd2d3d467.description: 1 unit of time invested in planning usually saves 10 times more in execution

2e0dafbd-825a-49b2-9567-4a864817a88a.name: everything is interconnected in life
2e0dafbd-825a-49b2-9567-4a864817a88a.description: Everything you do now is dependant and will be interdependant to everything hapenning to you. Thus do your best and leave the rest.
